content.detailedDescription: Was driving to pick up daughter from work. sitting at a traffic light, wife noticed it first. i initially ignored it and thought it to be aircraft lights. then looked and noticed it was not. best i can describe, it looked sort of like a balloon with fire flickering inside it, stronger toward the center and not quite reaching the perimeter of the object. it moved slowly from north to south, ascending slightly, and appeared to waver slightly while moving. if it were party balloon sized, it would have been perhaps eight stories up. however, another daughter saw the same object just as bright from 4 miles to our ssw. trees in her area would indicate that the object was higher and therefore larger than i had perceived. i ruled out aircraft lights because the we were not seeing the front of a craft due to its direction of movement. not a reflective surface as the change of angle during movement did not change light intensity. the outer perimeter surrounding the lit portion of the object was not quite clear. somewhat blurred to my eye. i can usually find a logical explanation for an odd sight, but this had me stumped, especially after hearing my daughters account of the object from her vantage point far away. anyway, i lost sight of it when the traffic light turned green and i had to make my left and continue on my way. thoughts?
content.summary: Bright light moving at a steady pace with slight directional changes from north to south

content.detailedDescription: The ufo appeared to be inches to the left of orion's belt. it was maneuvering in an i relevant manner as it was not keeping a steady pattern. originally i saw multicolored lights that seemed to blink randomly as it moved. i thought my eyes were playing a trick on me and i quickly got my wife and she confirmed that it was indeed moving in a random pattern. by that time it had backed off enough to not show the colored lights but maintained its star-like brightness.
content.summary: My wife and i both witnessed a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was closing my blinds when i say a light in the sky. upon closer inspection i saw it was triangle is shape and didn't move like a helicopter or aeroplane. i first saw it to the north but it quickly when south west moving in a weird manner. ive never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: It moved quick and silently it was dark with bright lights and moved in a zig zag like manner.

content.detailedDescription: Secondary finding as i was filming all the jet noise on way home 5:30 pm
content.summary: Crazy looking orbs. secondary to the jets i was trying to film while driving home from work.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my account of the incident. 

below my account is my cousins account. we were together when it happened. 
 

it started one evening in the summer i think it was june 1963 or 1964. i can't remember if i was 11 or 12. my cousin and i were the same age and we were on our way to our grandmother's house who lived near the lake of the ozarks in missouri. to the best of my recollection they were also two adults in the front seat of the car both of them were my aunt's, one was my cousin's mother and the other one was her sister our other aunt.
we were on our way from st.Louis to spend time at my grandmother's house. my cousin lived with my grandmother at the time but she must have ridden up in the car to pick me up i can't remember how that circumstances happened. i just know we were both in the car and i believe there was two adults in the front seat and we were driving down highway 21 heading toward lesterville missouri. i don't know the time i just know it was very dark outside this is a country road very windy with no street lights no lights of any kind so it's totally pitch black. we were the only car on the road that we could see and there were no other lights until this bright light appeared from behind us. we could see out the back of the car a bright bright light coming toward us and it just kept coming until we were engulfed in this bright light. we could not see any shape only bright lights, everyone in the car was totally silent it was like we were floating and in a trance of some sort. no one was talking, or screaming and no one was afraid. it doesn't make sense to me  why we would not have been talking or afraid or something. w
why was everybody just silent and in a trance-like state. it was really strange. it was just like we felt numb or something. and then right next to us close enough that we felt like we could reach out and touch them there were two greys which we could only see from their side view from the shoulder up. then they both turned and looked at us in unison. i don't understand why we weren't afraid and everything was totally silent.

 i don't know how long we were looking at them or they were looking at us. i don't know how long because we were in limbo of sorts, because we were not driving on this curvy road anymore and because i didn't feel the car moving. nothing really makes sense. 
after the grey's were done looking at us they turned in unison again back to the position they were in before they turn to look at us originally.  it was almost like they were  looking out the front of something. 
we had to be up in the air or something because otherwise we couldn't have been at the same level as the greys were.  because we were in a car on the ground it doesn't make sense. so i'm assuming either the whole car was lifted up or just we were. i just know we felt like we were floating.

at some point we were then driving again still no one was speaking about it, no one acted like anything had happened.  then we saw the bright light go in front of us. this bright round light which took off really fast going straight in front of us then shot up to the side and then when at another angle and then went straight up and disappeared.
i have no idea of the time lapse how long anything happened. i don't really know  if we were in the same location  after the incident happened as we were before it happened or if we were  closer to the house  we were going to. but when we arrived at my grandmother's house nobody talked about it nobody mentioned it no one acted afraid it was like it really never happened. then either the next day or the day after we started to talk about it a little bit and one of my aunts aunt's drew pictures of what we saw. back in those days i had no idea what an alien was, or what  a grey was.  the pictures that my aunt drew at the time which i don't have access to now, looked exactly like a grey. i had no idea what an alien or grey looked like at that time in my life. i don't think aliens or ufo's had ever been mentioned to me before this, incident but i know what i saw and it looks like exactly what grey's are depicted to look like now. it was a whitish grey smooth type of skin with big slanted eyes barely any nose and very small mouth no ears. i don't remember the expression on the greys face ever changing.
 my family discussed it a little bit throughout the years but i don't really think that most of them believed us.
below is the account of my cousin who was there too.


hello, this is my account of what happened on one summer night in the year 1963/1964 (not sure which year).
i was either 11 or 12 depending which year. my grandparents and i lived in lesterville,mo. 
63654. on route 21 cross street is county road 362. we had a 2 1/2 acre lake in front of the 
house, it was about 4-6 miles east of the town of lesterville. 
i believe the encounter took place during that summer at night ( not sure what time but it was dark out) on hwy 21 the roads are curvy with some hills. passengers in car were my aunt( has since passed) and i believe my mother( has since passed) was driving, our aunt didn’t drive, also my cousin and myself were in the back seat, not sure if i was on the driver side or not. there was no traffic out on the hwy keep in mind the population in lesterville at the time was around 240 give or take a few.
 it was dark in the car at the time. then there came a bright light from behind our car, so i’m sure we all thought it was another car. the light came up very fast from behind and then inside our car it became lit with light and the car we thought was coming up from behind was next to us, i think it was on the passenger side. i didn’t see that it was a car but saw that we and they were in a light ( it seemed like we were both in a 
dome of light). it seemed like we just floated a little with them above the road i don’t remember anyone talking or moving inside our car, it was like we were in suspended time and in slow motion, when i did turn my head to look at the light to my right all i remember seeing is two shapes that looked like smooth heads with big oval eyes, neck and shoulders. both turn 
simultaneously to look at us and just stared as we in turned stared back at them, not sure how much time had passed. they 
turned simultaneously to look away. i don’t remember moving at all. after that we saw the light go in front of us and disappeared. we were silent all the way to the house. i don’t know what time we arrived at the house and i don’t remember driving the rest of the way to the house. when we got to our grandparents house no one there said anything to us that we seemed different, so i can only assume we appear normal.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A bright light came up behind our car on a dark night, we were then engulfed in the light and saw 2 greys from the shoulders up. we were all in a trance like state, until we arrived at our destination.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out to let the dogs pee. it was like it wanted me to see it because i just looked up and there it was. i know it wasnt a plane or helicopter . the orb hoovered for 30 seconds slowly started to fly away and a incoming plane was coming so it stopped backed up waited for the plane to clear and then started to fly away at a low speed. behind the bright orb it looked like lightning flashing every 10 seconds or so.I was stunned
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Stepped out my trailer and observed glowing orb it flashed like lightning behind the orb. flew.,stopped backed up then flew away slowly

content.detailedDescription: New year eve night 5 boats(all long line boats out of merits marina in pompano beach fl)headed south out of hillsboro inlet approx 3pm.  after reaching our drop location(35 miles se of miami)we dropped appox 7 miles of line and settled in maintaining and watching the line. the ocean was so flat it felt as if you could step off of the back of the boat and walk on the water. about 45 minutes into the watch 5 captains and 40 crew notice a red white and green(blueish) light blinking to the sw(cuba keys area).The head captain radioed all the others if we were seeing what they were seeing. all the captains said yes and thought it might be another boat in distress. he said he would head over that way and check it out. with in a few minutes there were 2 other lights identical to the one we were already observing. that's when they started dropping below the water and in a blink of an eye they moved in a triangular motion under the water and then resurfaced about tree level. the captain once again called the other captains and sa are you seeing this.All agreed.That's when he decided to call the coast guard to see if there was anything going on that they knew of.5 minutes pasted and they replied nothing that they were aware of. at that point the lights started getting closer at least to our boat. we all agreed that this was really weird and something none of us had seen before.All the captains agreed that we recall the coast guard and report a possible boat in distress. coast guard said they would send a plane out and check it out.  15 to 20 minutes later we could hear the plane approaching and the lights disappeared underneath the water. the coast guard scanned 1800 sq miles and reported back to us they had found nothing.  we told them when they showed up that the lights had quit. they return to the base.   15 minutes after the plane had returned the lights reappeared but didn't seem to be interested in getting any closer than they had before. we didn't report it again out of fear the reporting captain might lose his licenses.
content.summary: Blinding light(like looking at mini sun)

content.detailedDescription: Mother and i were on a red eye flight from la to kc.  plane took off, cabin lights out, we had our window shade open.  we saw a huge cigar shaped ship lingering by the airplane.  we discussed it in whispers, wondered what to do.  it had pulsating lights along the bottom changing colors from one end to the other red to blue.  we were afraid, no, petrified.  i remember praying and crying.  we held each other's hands and oddly fell asleep.
content.summary: Red-eye flight from la to kc, pulsating lights one end blue to other end red, hovered at least while over pacific

content.detailedDescription:
Suite mail, vu avec directeur national.

premier ã©vã©nement :
etant enfant, j'ai plusieurs fois vu un "petit bonhomme" dans ma chambre lorsque je dormais. je n'arrive pas ã  me souvenir prã©cisã©ment de son visage, jusque sa forme ã©tant celle d'un enfant dans le noir et qu'il ã©tait trã¨s fin.
il me montrait des choses que je ne comprenaient pas, mais qui me faisaient peur, ã  travers une sorte de "bulle" entourã© d'un halo. 
lui n'ã©tait pas dans la bulle, il ã©tait un peu devant et ã©tait prã©sent dans la chambre et ce que je voyait ã  travers cette bulle semblait bien rã©el (pas comme s'il s'agissait d'un ã©cran, mais plus comme une fenãªtre).

je comprenais ce qu'il me disait quand je le regardais dans les yeux, il n'ouvrait jamais la bouche. 

je me souvient parfaitement ne pas aimer du tout ce que je voyait dans cette bulle. il me "faisait penser" ou plutã´t me martelait dans la tãªte qu'il ã©tait bon et que ce qu'il me montrait ã©tait mauvais, je me souvient ressentir qu'il ã©tait bon, je me sentais bien quand il ã©tait prã©sent. 
une fois, cette bulle ã©tait trã¨s grosse et j'ai pensã© "je ne veux pas ãªtre seul avec ce mã©chant". la bulle est devenu plus petite et le petit bonhomme c'est mis devant, il ma regardã© et j'ai entendu dans ma tãªte "ne t'inquiã¨te pas, s'il revient je serait lã , tu n'as rien a craindre". il me disait souvent que je n'avais pas ã  avoir peur.

il voulait parfois que je rã©agisse ã  ce qui se passait. je pointais des choses sur la "scã¨ne" qu'il me montrait en pensant, "il va faire ã§a", il va arriver ã§a", etc.
le petit bonhomme semblait trã¨s attentif ã  ce que je pensais. je m'en souvient car il avait une sorte de tã©lã©commande dans la main qu'il pianotais ã  chaque fois que je dã©signais quelque chose.

deuxiã¨me ã©vã©nement:
vers 23 ans (j'en ai 31 aujourd'hui), j'ã©tait en foret, la nuit, avec mon tã©lescope et j'ai vu un point lumineux venir vers moi, j'ai alors pensai ã  un satellite. mais en se rapprochant, je l'ai trouvã© rapide et plus gros qu'un satellite, je me suis alors dis que c'ã©tait l'iss (quand on observe les astres, on s'habitue ã  voir des satellites ou l'iss briller dans le ciel).
mais j'ai vu un autre point de la mãªme taille le suivre, je me suis dis "deux satellite qui se suivent ???", j'ai trouvã© ã§a ã©trange.
le premier point s'est arrãªtã© d'un coup presque au dessus de moi, lorsque le deuxiã¨me l'a rejoint, le premier est parti ã  toute vitesse ã  90â° et le deuxiã¨me l'a aussi suivi et les deux ont disparu au milieu du ciel.
cela c'est passã© trã¨s vite mais lorsque j'ai regardã© ma montre, je me suis rendu compte qu'il me manquait une heure. je me suis dis "pas possible que je regarde ã§a depuis une heure", si je ne me fie pas ã  ma montre, pour moi cette observation n'a durã©e que 4/5 secondes.

cordialement.
content.summary: Visite d'un petit ãªtre dans ma chambre + point lumineux dans le ciel.

content.detailedDescription:
Case 1

night between october 4 and 5 1979  (round 3am)
close encounters of the third kind in viggiù (italy)
by carlo pirola
(member of cun - centro ufologico nazionale)

in the early morning hours of october 5, 1979, mr. aldo natoli (38) waked up like every morning. he worked a dustman and street-sweeper in varese. at 3am he washed his face, got dressed and drank his usual coffee. round 3:20 am he left his house, trying not to slam the entrance door avoiding to wake his little daughter and his wife, still sleeping. then he walked out toward the garage where there was his motorbike, a vespa 50 motorcycle. once he reached the garage, he pushed his motorbike without switching it up to avoid any noise that could wake up his family members. he took a look around his garden and walked for few meters with his motorbike by his side until he arrived at the beginning of his private short road made of stones. he took from the pocket the rest of a cigarette he didn’t smoke the day before and put it on his lips and he started up his motorcycle. half way of his private road, between two pine trees, on the left side, he saw two dwarfs 70 or 80 centimeters if height. they looked like puppets and they hovered 20 centimeters from the soil. they were meager and very agitated, jumping here and there, floating in the air. and appeared to be colored in blue, their faces too. their face was skinny and human. their human eyes were staring at aldo and he could not figure out anything about their intentions. meanwhile he realized his motorcycle switched off even if front light was still on illuminating the little thin men. he tried to take couple of steps toward them but when he was about to touch them, they suddenly disappeared. he then went back inside to tell his experience to the rest of the family. his daughter and wife suggested him to notify everything to the police. he was not afraid but only curious to know who were those little entities in blue. 
(source: ufo revision -2017- by carlo pirola)

case 2 

night of june 1992 (round 4am) 
close encounters of the third kind in viggiù (italy)
by carlo pirola
(member of cun - centro ufologico nazionale)

in the very heart of the night, in a country house in viggiù, near varese (northern italy), the natoli family is sleeping but, suddenly, everyone can hear a terrible shout coming from one of the bedrooms. the shout comes from the bedroom where mr. aldo natoli and his wife are sleeping. their only daughter runs to see what’s happening and she finds her dad sitting on the bed, pointing to the open window. he claims to be visited by two strange dwarfs (90 cm height), the same he encountered 13 years before in his short private road leading to his house in october 1979.
(source: ufo revision -2017- by carlo pirola)
content.summary: Close encounter with 2 dwarfs entities - no craft, no ufo, no lights

content.detailedDescription: So i will start at the beginning. it was a little bit past 9 pm. it was really dark outside. so i was browsing the web with talking to my friend via skype. the roomwas quite hot because of the radiators. so i turned them off and openes my window to let the cold air fill the room. a few seconds later i saw the light that is on my garden (activates if theres a moving object) so it turned on and i heard three quiet steps in the snow. so i was really scared because i thought there is a person on my property so i yelled "hello!? is somebody there?" and noone reaponded. i was listening with my window open for about 5min until i noticed an orange light on the left side of the church in my town. i thought it was an airplane but then i remembered that they only have green and red lights. so i was like "what the hell is this?" i watched alot of alien documentaries so i was really scared because i think that is a ufo then the light moved a little bit right i could tell that because of the church iland it was closer to it now.After tjat it was about 20seconds and it dissapeared tottaly. i checked flightradar24 and there was no airplane passing nearby but there was a military drone in the air with the callsign sloctrl1 but it was stationary above ljubljana and it wasnt visible from my house. i had a huge paranoia that night. i was hearing strange sounds comming from my in my home but i went to check but i found nothing and no strange sound...
content.summary: Orange light flashing in the sky not moving at all. star sized from my pov.

content.detailedDescription: 8:00 pm, tuesday, february 13th. we were driving home from the grocery store, on a road through the mountains. we noticed a series of orbs moving horizontally across the sky in front of us. each orb would light up, and then would start to fade. as one would start to darken, the light next to it would light up, before they would all disappear. the first sighting of the same phenomenon, the lights appeared to be stacked in two horizontal rows, but went to only one row afterward. we pulled the vehicle over to the side of the road, as this happened again, and continued to watch. at one point, the orbs lit up and branched out to the left and right, before turning back and going toward the middle again. we turned the vehicle around and drove back toward the store, turned back and watched again. the video was taken, during the last series of light orbs. after that, the sky went black and nothing else was witnessed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing red/orange objects stayed in the same place for 30 min. colors went from dark orange to light orange from side to side and changed sequence. it started out with two. then three. then around6-7, then would go back to smaller, then start over again

content.detailedDescription: I first observed the object as i was traveling home on the mass pike at around 1 am. it seemed to be following me as i drove.I initially noticed four individual illuminated orbs in the four corners of the sky. they we encircling what i believe was a craft of some kind. as the craft began to diappear from my sight, they lights danced around each other gaining momentum and finally the object shot off into space.
content.summary: I saw multiple orbs circling each other then the object took off and disappeared from my line of sight

content.detailedDescription:
after my friends and i made contact with 4 objects at the top of anhangava hill, in the city of quatro barras, my wife and i see these objects daily, even in bad weather (even between lightning storms we have already seen).
this fact is no longer secondary in my life, i have been investigating since the day that happened, and with each new discovery, i see myself increasingly involved ...
as for the objects we saw on the hill, 3 had silhouettes similar to heads, while 1 was larger spherical shape.
from time to time, the 3 smaller ones merged with the larger one.
they all had the same pattern of lights, flashed most of the time a huge white light, and sometimes emitted a red light.
we began to imitate them with signs of lanterns, and to our surprise we were answered every time.
the contact began around 3 am, and ended near sunrise at 6 o'clock in the morning, when a huge red and spherical object appeared on the horizon, flew over us, and when we realized it, about 50 light points above of us, who we imagined were stars, began to follow her, all blinking white and red.They headed toward the sunrise and disappeared into the horizon. the 4 small projects that we saw first, remained on the top of a hill a little lower, morro do pão de loth, where they responded to our flashes until the daylight took hold and it was not possible.
content.summary: Ufo squad, composed bu many types and shapes, have communication by flashes with us

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:30 am on january 29, 2018 i had been watching television that i had fell asleep to in my living room. i got up to let my two dogs out in the backyard which is paralell with interstate 20 in weatherford tx, as i approached the backyard at around this time of night it is almost pitch black outside because of nearby bussiness's that turn off their lights completely to save money i'm geussing.. almost every light except for a few in every mile is off around this time including the big advertising signs that are across the street from my house so the night sky is very beautiful at this time, being able to see constellations very clearly. well right before i was going to open my sliding door to let my dogs out i had noticed two strange pulsating lights traveling towards me, because as i stared at them i was in awe and also trying to figure out if they were just airplanes or maybe choppers but then i noticed that these objects had pulsating lights that seem to have changed colors from a white to a orange then from orange to a red and from red to gold it was pulsating but strangely turning colors at a very slow rate like nothing i have seen before, so as i was in awe just watching them i saw the object to the left started to change direction in a zig zagging pattern and all of a sudden it went from being close range to the other object to almost immediately traveling a great distance to the west and descending as it traveled then it just hovered and slowley traveled west and then came to a stop and hovered at a distance while the other object was traveling toward my house as i focused my attention on the closer object it started to take shape because of how close it was getting. again i was in complete awe so i just stood there watching this object pulsate the same kind of lights as the other one and was zig zagging at slow rate till it got closer then again this object came to a complete stop and hovered about 40 degrees from my sight i could tell it completely stopped because it was on the the other side of a electrical poll in my backyard so i could tell if it was moving or not about a couple minutes of just standing there watching i started to notice almost like a faint beam come down from the bottom of the top shape object and about four or five white orbs started coming out of the bottom of this object at that point i was getting kind of freaked out because i have never seen anything like this before in my life. i was in the marine corps and had seen my fair share of aircraft,flares and explosives etc.. so as this was happening i ran in the house from my porch and got my phone to try to capture what was happening i was only gone for about a minute, but when i returned i could only see both of the bigger objects but none of the orbs that had dispersed. so before these were gone i wanted to get some pictures on my phone. unfortunately i thought my camera and video camera would have caught a decient picture or video but it just was not suffient enough to get good details or shapes just little dots in the sky if i tried to take a good photo but i will still include them below. besides the camera i actually had gone outside and was able to continue to observe these objects at a hover in the sky for the next 15 minutes or so before disappearing completely from view. after this first sighting i saw only one object within the next week or so in the same part of the sky with the same lights and shape but in different directions and altitude.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Top shaped craft with pulsating lights that seamed to slowy changed color that zigzagged then hovered with looked like a beam of smaller orbs dispersed from the bottom of craft or object.

content.detailedDescription: Observed from my 15th floor condo 4 miles from pentagon a large object in the west sky on february 12th at 6pm. it looked like a large aquatic like mammal with flippers or wings, dark in color slowly rotating in the sky. it rotated to the side facing in the direction of the pentagon.  when i took pictures i captured about 7 or 8 glowing white objects that took on different shapes and separated.  not sure how long show lasted, probably about two hours because i stopped watching.
content.summary: I live about 5 miles or less from the pentagon off of route 395 in a condo on the 15th fl. brownish object looked like an aquatic mammal with wings and it rotated from front to side. in pics i saw glowing objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east on early mills rd when i first saw it. it had four brilliant white light, no pulse, blink or color change. they were equally spaced apart. at arms length they appeared about the size of a shirt button. the lights illuminated an upper and lower edge above the lights. above that edge, it appeared to curve into a cigar shaped. the lights didn't illuminate far enough to tell. it moved very slowly and smoothly in a constant direction, east. i heard no sound. i drove on pheasant road as fast as possible to show my wife, but till i got in the house to show show out back, it was no longer visible. in a news feed, ufo's have been seen in the area very recently, dauphin county.
content.summary: 4 brilliant white lights, illuminated an edge top & bottom, top & bottom looked cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: The ufo cube was chasing the bus until we heard a sound and it was gone. was it trying to do something cause it suprized everyone on the bus!
content.summary: Giant cube object follows us

content.detailedDescription:
724 pm feb 13, 2028

saw a bright red-orange glow moving tom north to south over lockwood ridge and university. no noise. moving relatively slowly versus a jet aircraft. very bright. it then turned to the west over the gulf of  mexico. got dimmer as it moved further west. finally disappeared over nearby house.
content.summary: Bright glowing red orange shape moving north to south then changing votes west.

content.detailedDescription:
Il ã©tait 19h31, j'allais pour rentrer chez moi en voiture, j'ai voulu regarder le ciel et j'ai commencã© par observã© 2 boules oranges, j'ai pris mon tã©lã©phone portable et j'ai pris 1 photo ( je tremblais ). 2 min aprã¨s elles n'ã©taient plus 2, mais 5. j'ai commencã© a voir que les boules en questions se diriger ensemble, et se rapprocher l'une des l'autres. 
ce que j'ai pensã© pour la premiã¨re fois, c'est que c'ã©tait complã©tement anormal, qu'il ne pouvait pas s'agir de " drones ", certainement d'objets volants non identifiã©s. une fois les 2 min en question, les 4 boules allaient dans l'est, toutes ensemble jusqu'ã  que la 5ã¨me apparaisse, les 4 autres avaient dã©jã  disparues du champ de vision. aprã¨s avoir vu cela, j'ai continuer ma route vers chez moi, tout en regardant ce qu'il allait ce produire, je dã©pose ma voiture, en observant la 5ã¨me boule toujours lã  tandis que ses copines ã©taient dã©jã  parties, la 5e boule a disparu comme un simple claquement de doigt, comme sur un interrupteur allumer/ã©teindre..
content.summary: Sphã¨res orange bougeant dans l'ensemble

content.detailedDescription:
A paray vieille poste dans l'essonne, vers minuit le 23/10/2018, une minute aprã¨s ãªtre sorti pour observer le ciel dans le jardin avant d'aller me coucher, je vois 3 points lumineux alignã©s de front moyennement brillant au zã©nith se dã©plaã§ant en direction du nord.
j'ai l'habitude d'observer le ciel trã¨s encombrã© d'avions de lignes en rã©gion parisienne. lã  aucun clignotement, juste des lumiã¨res ponctuelles un peu jaunes qui se dã©placent ã  la vitesse d'un avion de ligne en altitude de croisiã¨re. et trois points lumineux en formation, c'est pas banal.
les 3 points sont sã©parã©s de moins de la largeur d'un petit doigt avec le bras tendu. lã  oã¹ ã§a devient trã¨s curieux, c'est le comportement du point central qui fait des mouvements un peu alã©atoire doucement entre les deux autres qui eux poursuivent en ligne droite.
j'ai jamais vu ã§a. j'ai pensã© ã  des lanternes chinoises bien sur mais ã§a ne colle pas. dã©jã  le vent n'est jamais dans ce sens dans la rã©gion et pourquoi le point central aurait des agissements diffã©rents des deux autres.
des rentrã©es d'objets atmosphã©riques sont aussi plus qu'improbables.
des appareils militaires ? des drones ? autres chose ?
une minute aprã¨s le dã©but de l'observation, ils n'ã©taient plus assez lumineux pour que je puisse les suivre. la pollution lumineuse est trã¨s intense ici.
content.summary: 3 points lumineux jaunes alignã©s de front en dã©placement linã©aire. point central bougeant.

content.detailedDescription:
Wir sassen morgensfrüh auf dem balkon, es war wolkenloser morgen, als wir es zum ersten mal bemerkten , war es seitlich oberhalb über uns, durch die plözliche verdunklung , eher dimmung des lichts das auf die terasse schien, 

es war etwas gigantisches ,um rungen mit dunklen wolken , sowie eine pyhroklastische wolken , aber in zeitlupe von vorne nach hinten wälsten

vergleichbar ist es mit der szene von deep impact, wo dieser über die autobahn flog, aber die geschwindigkeit war nur die eines flugzeugs, gab keine geräusche, kein einschlag nichts dergleichen, und niemand sah was ausser ich und ein freund und nichts in den narichten so als dass was wir sahen nie staht gefunden hätte 

es war gross, es hatte eine unvorstellbarer langer schweif von einer seite des horizont zum andern, so detailliert, langsam und ohne ton
content.summary: Es sah so aus wie kurz vor dem ende der welt unbeschreiblich schön doch gleichzeitig wusste man wenn es einschlägt gebe es kein überleben

content.detailedDescription:
1. i went out back for a smoke with a friend and i noticed an object to my west. 

2.It was hovering, and pulsating. this is not the first one i have seen.

3.I wasnt quite sure, an orb-type of object/entity.

4. it flew directly up and towars us, while pulsating and at a steady speed. it flashed at me when i mentioned the time. at one point, it drops a small red orb off of the back that my samsung did not pick up. it flew towards us and straigt up so i couldnt even see it anymore as the sun was going to come over the horizon from the west.

5.I felt insanely centered on the object, and had chills. i was basically astonished. after the sighting there was nothing.

6. the thing literally flew up so high it disappeared from eyesight.
content.summary: This thing flew up into the sky so high at the end we couldnt see it anymore.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my job on spring mountain and arville when i looked up in the sky and saw a bunch of clouds. i noticed flashing lights of red, purple , and green hiding behind the clouds. i recorded some of it. when i drove home i could still see the same flashing lights. second sighting for myself except this time more colorful lights!I was excited. had my boyfriend come out and see it. he's a believer as well.
content.summary: Saw flashing lights of red, purple, green

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a cigarette on my front porch and halfway through my smoke i noticed three balls of light with a flickering glow around the ball of light. fire best describes the glow.They were floating but still moving all in the same direction one ahead of the others and two following behind. they were not flying straight in uniform but still all traveling in the same direction almost as if the two following behind were being playful with each other while flying. i have never seen anything else like this. at first i thought maybe drones but these went from far as the eye can see in one direction and went as far as the eye can see into the other direction until i couldn’t see them anymore. there was no drone humming or engine sounds that i could hear.
content.summary: Have never seen anything like this

content.detailedDescription:
Smoking cig and noticed flashing light, then moved quickly and continued moving in fast odd directions, seems to hover moving right and left like floating on water, continued doing this until way off in distance

was seen by me and my cousin for about 20 minutes until we went inside because of cold

tried to film with phone but didnt seem to appear on phone
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Smoking cig and noticed flashing light, then moved quickly and continued moving in fast odd directions, seems to hover moving right and left like floating on water, continued doing this until way off in distance

content.detailedDescription: 711 and walmart and me and mom were looking and saw 5 weird lights we thought is was air planes. we pull over to check it out now there are 3 flashing lights in the distance. one started to get closer and soon we saw a black square box. it was huge like half a car. mom says it a drone and gets out and i said no. as she got out and she said that it stoped right over her head and the lights went out completely. she then said no it can’t be a drone gets back in the car and the lights of it go back on and it starts to move slowly again. what made us notice was that there were so many and the lights were beaming so big. we both thought they were planes and then drones but soon turned to the thought of a ufo.They were going in a circle and would change the direction they circled.They would also hover and disappear.We felt amazed and a little scared.We went over to talk to someone and see if they saw it and when we walked back home we waited to see but they were gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Square ufo thing with blue red green lights and hovering

content.detailedDescription: 711 and walmart and me and mom were looking and saw 5 weird lights we thought is was air planes. we pull over to check it out now there are 3 flashing lights in the distance. one started to get closer and soon we saw a black square box. it was huge like half a car. mom says it a drone and gets out and i said no. as she got out and she said that it stoped right over her head and the lights went out completely. she then said no it can’t be a drone gets back in the car and the lights of it go back on and it starts to move slowly again. what made us notice was that there were so many and the lights were beaming so big. we both thought they were planes and then drones but soon turned to the thought of a ufo.They were going in a circle and would change the direction they circled.They would also hover and disappear.We felt amazed and a little scared.We went over to talk to someone and see if they saw it and when we walked back home we waited to see but they were gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Square ufo thing with blue red green lights and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on sutters mill rd towards jungermann when myself any my passenger observed hovering crafts with lights in the distance.  the crafts were about 200 yards apart and were rotating.  we continued to drive until we reached jungermann road where we pulled into a walmart peking lot.  

we observed the crafts flying and hovering above.  i got out of my car as i was going to attempt to take a photograph and when i walked behind my car a craft slowly approached from the south side of the lot and lowered quietly down to approximately 200 foot above me.  the blinking lights on the craft turned off and the craft went “dark”.  

at first i was thinking it was a drone, but when it got closer it was too large & quiet to be a drone, but too small and quiet to be a plane.

the appearance was square / rectangular and dark grey / black in color.  it was about the size of a small car and was almost opaque like looking at dark tinted windows hovering in the sky above me.

i looked back at the passenger door of my car and then looked back up, the lights turned back on, the craft started to rotate and then “glided” across the sky ascending about 200 feet up and to the north.  about the time it was close to 200 yards away, the next craft was coming close.  

after a few minutes they all disappeared.  we drove back down sutters mill towards mexico road.  about 15 minutes later i looked outside and saw the same lights/crafts.  i called my daughter out and then my husband.  we all observed 3 crafts moving in the same manners above the houses in the neighborhood.  

this continued for about 5-10 minutes and then disappeared again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 3-5 craft spaced about 200 yards between each other, hovering and rotating. then would move along a set path and the next craft would come in.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on lake springs rd turning onto steele rd, a bright green ball(orb) is in the sky above treeline in the field. the sighting lasts approx. 3 secs.  when looking back to try to find it, it is always gone.  never see what direction it goes, it just disappears.  before each event, i get the feeling of being watched or someone is going to jump into my car with me. i feel afraid something bad is about to happen.  this has happened 4 times in an 8 month period.  the times vary from 9 to 11 pm
content.summary: Green ball of light observed 4 times in 8 months
